original_title: UFC Fight Night 98: dos Anjos vs. Ferguson
overview: UFC Fight Night 98: dos Anjos vs. Ferguson was a mixed martial arts event held on November 5, 2016, at Arena Ciudad de MÃ©xico in Mexico City, Mexico. A potential lightweight title eliminator bout between former UFC Lightweight Champion Rafael dos Anjos and The Ultimate Fighter: Team Lesnar vs. Team dos Santos winner Tony Ferguson headlined the event.
title: UFC Fight Night 98: dos Anjos vs. Ferguson
